Our Research Questions:
1. Does beach width significantly impact hotel revenue?
2. Does ecotourism significantly impact hotel revenue as measured by amount of coral and distance to popular dive sites?

```{r echo = F, message = F, include = F}

# Import data
data <- read_csv("regression_10km.csv")
#View(data)

# Correct data classes
data$Pool <- as.factor(data$Pool)
data$Bar <- as.factor(data$Bar)
data$Biz_Center <- as.factor(data$Biz_Center)
data$Conference <- as.factor(data$Conference)
data$Mtg_Rooms <- as.factor(data$Mtg_Rooms)
data$Wifi <- as.factor(data$Wifi)
data$Multilingual <- as.factor(data$Multilingual)
data$No_Smoke <- as.factor(data$No_Smoke)
data$Breakfast_ <- as.factor(data$Breakfast_)
data$Air_Trans <- as.factor(data$Air_Trans)
data$Free_Parking <- as.factor(data$Free_Parking)
data$Beachfront <- as.factor(data$Beachfront)
data$Wheelchair <- as.factor(data$Wheelchair)
data$Concierge <- as.factor(data$Concierge)
data$Laundry <- as.factor(data$Laundry)
data$Gym <- as.factor(data$Gym)
data$City <- as.factor(data$City)
data$dive_site <- as.factor(data$dive_site)

# Add a column with average price
data1 <- data %>%
  select(2, 6:38, -LATITUDE, -LONGITUDE) %>% 
  mutate(avg_price = (Low_Price + High_Price)/2) %>% 
  clean_names()

# Correct the rooms column to reviews
names(data1)[3] <- "num_reviews"

#View(data1)

```

```{r results = "asis"}

# Filter out Key West
data_nokw <- data1 %>% 
  filter(city != "KeyWest")
#View(data_nokw)

# Filter out Boca
data_noboca <- data1 %>% 
  filter(city != "Boca")
#View(data_noboca)

# Regression with everything, using # of dive sites

reg_all <- lm(avg_price ~ rating + num_reviews + pool + bar + biz_center + conference + mtg_rooms + wheelchair + concierge + laundry + gym + wifi + multilingual + no_smoke + breakfast + air_trans + free_parking + beachfront + near_dist_beach + beach_width + dist_to_access_points + dist_to_airport + dist_to_dive + dist_to_reef + num_dive + coral_cover + city, data = data1)
#summary(reg_all)

reg_nokw <- lm(avg_price ~ rating + num_reviews + pool + bar + biz_center + conference + mtg_rooms + wheelchair + concierge + laundry + gym + wifi + multilingual + no_smoke + breakfast + air_trans + free_parking + beachfront + near_dist_beach + beach_width + dist_to_access_points + dist_to_airport + dist_to_dive + dist_to_reef + num_dive + coral_cover + city, data = data_nokw)
#summary(reg_nokw)

reg_noboca <- lm(avg_price ~ rating + num_reviews + pool + bar + biz_center + conference + mtg_rooms + wheelchair + concierge + laundry + gym + wifi + multilingual + no_smoke + breakfast + air_trans + free_parking + beachfront + near_dist_beach + beach_width + dist_to_access_points + dist_to_airport + dist_to_dive + dist_to_reef + num_dive + coral_cover + city, data = data_noboca)

compare_all <- stargazer(reg_all, reg_nokw, reg_noboca, type = "html",
                         title = "Models with all Variables",
                         column.labels = c("All Cities", "No KW", "No Boca"),
                         out = "compare.html")

# Regression without amenity factors
all_noamen <- lm(avg_price ~ rating + num_reviews + near_dist_beach + beach_width + dist_to_access_points + dist_to_airport + dist_to_dive + dist_to_reef + num_dive + coral_cover + city, data = data1)
#summary(all_noamen)

no_kw_noamen <- lm(avg_price ~ rating + num_reviews + near_dist_beach + beach_width + dist_to_access_points + dist_to_airport + dist_to_dive + dist_to_reef + num_dive + coral_cover + city, data = data_nokw)

no_b_noamen <- lm(avg_price ~ rating + num_reviews + near_dist_beach + beach_width + dist_to_access_points + dist_to_airport + dist_to_dive + dist_to_reef + num_dive + coral_cover + city, data = data_noboca)

compare_noamen <- stargazer(all_noamen, no_kw_noamen, no_b_noamen, type = "html",
                         title = "Models without Amenities",
                         column.labels = c("All Cities", "No KW", "No Boca"),
                         out = "compare_noamen.html")

```

```{r}

# Log log regressions

# First, transform columns with zeroes
data_log <- data1 %>% 
  mutate(log_width = log(beach_width + sqrt(1 + beach_width^2))) %>% 
  mutate(log_dive = log(num_dive + sqrt(1 + num_dive^2)))
View(data_log)

data_log_nob <- data_log %>%
  filter(city != "Boca")
View(data_log_nob)

# Log log model with no amenities
log_log_city <- lm(log(avg_price) ~ log(rating) + log(num_reviews) + log(near_dist_beach) + log_width + log(dist_to_access_points) + log(dist_to_airport) + log(dist_to_dive) + log(dist_to_reef) + log_dive + log(coral_cover) + city, data = data_log)
#summary(log_log)

# Now without boca
log_log_nob <- lm(log(avg_price) ~ log(rating) + log(num_reviews) + log(near_dist_beach) + log_width + log(dist_to_access_points) + log(dist_to_airport) + log(dist_to_dive) + log(dist_to_reef) + log_dive + log(coral_cover) + city, data = data_log_nob)

# Model with binary for dive sites
log_log_dive <- lm(log(avg_price) ~ log(rating) + log(num_reviews) + log(near_dist_beach) + log_width + log(dist_to_access_points) + log(dist_to_airport) + log(dist_to_dive) + log(dist_to_reef) + dive_site + log(coral_cover) + city, data = data_log)

table <- stargazer(log_log_city, log_log_nob, log_log_dive, type = "html",
                   title = "Log Log Model",
                   column.labels = c("All Cities", "W/o Boca", "Binary Dive Site"),
                   out = "log-log.html")

# Dive site binary, remove distance to dive
log_log_dive1 <- lm(log(avg_price) ~ log(rating) + log(num_reviews) + log(near_dist_beach) + log_width + log(dist_to_access_points) + log(dist_to_airport) + log(dist_to_reef) + dive_site + log(coral_cover) + city, data = data_log)

# Adding back some amenities
log_log_dive2 <- lm(log(avg_price) ~ log(rating) + log(num_reviews) + log(near_dist_beach) + log_width + log(dist_to_access_points) + log(dist_to_airport) + log(dist_to_reef) + dive_site + log(coral_cover) + city + conference + air_trans + beachfront, data = data_log)

compare_log <- stargazer(log_log_dive, log_log_dive1, log_log_dive2, type = "html",
                         title = "Log-Log Dive Models",
                         column.labels = c("Binary Dive Site", "No Dist to Dive", "Add Amenities"),
                         out = "loglog-dive.html")

```

```{r}

# Try removing beach width
ll_dive <- lm(log(avg_price) ~ log(rating) + log(num_reviews) + log(near_dist_beach) + log(dist_to_access_points) + log(dist_to_airport) + log(dist_to_dive) + log(dist_to_reef) + dive_site + log(coral_cover) + city, data = data_log)

ll_dive_nodist <- lm(log(avg_price) ~ log(rating) + log(num_reviews) + log(near_dist_beach) + log(dist_to_access_points) + log(dist_to_airport) + log(dist_to_reef) + dive_site + log(coral_cover) + city, data = data_log)

ll_dive_amen <- lm(log(avg_price) ~ log(rating) + log(num_reviews) + log(near_dist_beach) + log(dist_to_access_points) + log(dist_to_airport) + log(dist_to_reef) + dive_site + log(coral_cover) + city + conference + air_trans + beachfront, data = data_log)

compare_ll <- stargazer(ll_dive, ll_dive_nodist, ll_dive_amen, type = "html",
                         title = "Log-Log Dive Models",
                         column.labels = c("Binary Dive Site", "No Dist to Dive", "Add Amenities"),
                         out = "ll-dive.html")


```

```{r}
# Trying very simplified regressions

reg_simple <- lm(avg_price ~ coral_cover + beach_width + city, data = data1)
summary(reg_simple)
# Both coral cover and beach width are positive, but not significant

# Simple log-log model
log_log_simple <- lm(log(avg_price) ~ log(coral_cover) + log_width + city, data = data_log)
summary(log_log_simple)
# Variables positive, Boca shown to be highest, try without Boca

# Remove Boca
lglg_simple_nob <- lm(log(avg_price) ~ log(coral_cover) + log_width + city, data = data_log_nob)
summary(lglg_simple_nob)
# Variables still directionally correct and now coral is significant. 

# Start to add in more variables:
names(data1)
lglg_nob_amen <- lm(log(avg_price) ~ log(rating) + log(dist_to_access_points) + log(coral_cover) + beachfront + log_width + city, data = data_log_nob)
summary(lglg_nob_amen)


```
